summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for disposition of monies seized and forfeited and proceeds of the sale of goods and materials seized and forfeited pursuant to the Uniform Controlled Substances Act; accepting such forfeitures; appropriating such monies for enforcement of drug laws through an agreement with King County for a drug diversion court; authorizing the Mayor to enter into such an agreement with King County; and establishing an expenditure allowance in the 1994 budget of the Department of Finance General, all by three-fourths vote.
